title: T.V. commercials: Holdens
brief_description: A series of ten commercials which represent the total television advertising campaign by GM-H over one year. Individual titles include: “Breakaway”, “Scene stealers”, “Big car/little car”, “Little old lady”, “Fishing village” and “Rain”.
